trans-unit.source: Implements a personalization provider that uses Microsoft SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: Implementerer en leverandør av personlige data som bruker Microsoft SQL Server.

trans-unit.source: This class defines the required functionality for a personalization provider using Microsoft SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen definerer den nødvendige funksjonaliteten for en leverandør av personlige data ved hjelp av Microsoft SQL Server.

trans-unit.source: A personalization provider both loads and stores personalization data on behalf of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> instance.
trans-unit.target: Leverandør av personlige data både laster inn og lagrer personlige data på vegne av en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>forekomsten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>

trans-unit.source: This class implements the logic for reading from and writing to computers running SQL Server, and also implements all the abstract methods defined in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Klassen implementerer logikken for lesing fra og skrive til datamaskiner som kjører SQL Server og implementerer også alle abstrakt metodene som er definert i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>

trans-unit.source: For more information on personalization providers, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om bruk av personlige data leverandører, kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>

trans-unit.source: The data design for using Web Parts personalization with SQL Server relies on the existence of two common SQL database tables, and their supporting stored procedures, that are shared for most SQL-based feature implementations.
trans-unit.target: Data-utformingen for bruk av personlige data webdeler med SQL Server er avhengig av forekomsten av to vanlige SQL-databasetabeller, og deres støtter lagrede prosedyrer som er felles for de fleste SQL-baserte funksjonen implementeringer.

trans-unit.source: These tables and views are installed and uninstalled using the following scripts: - installpagepersonalization.sql – Installs the personalization tables, views, and related stored procedures.
trans-unit.target: Disse tabellene og visningene er installert og avinstalleres ved hjelp av de følgende skriptene: - installpagepersonalization.sql – installerer tilpassing tabeller, visninger og lagrede prosedyrene.

trans-unit.source: - uninstallpagepersonalization.sql – Uninstalls the personalization tables, views, and related stored procedures.
trans-unit.target: -uninstallpagepersonalization.sql – avinstallerer tilpassing tabeller, visninger og lagrede prosedyrene.

trans-unit.source: It is important to be aware that personalization will fail if your Web application does not run at the default trust level of <xref:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel> or higher (you can set custom trust levels in a Web.config file using the `<trust level="" />` element).
trans-unit.target: Det er viktig å være klar over at personlige data vil mislykkes hvis webprogrammet ikke kjører på standard stoler på <xref:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel>eller høyere (du kan angi egendefinerte klareringsnivåer i en Web.config filen ved hjelp av `<trust level="" />` elementet).</xref:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationAdministration> and SqlPersonalizationProvider classes both check for a trust level of <xref:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel> when they are initialized.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationAdministration>og SqlPersonalizationProvider klasser begge se etter en klareringsnivået for <xref:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel>når de er initialisert.</xref:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationAdministration>

trans-unit.source: If you configure your application to run at a trust level of <xref:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel>, and you use the default SqlPersonalizationProvider provider to manage the personalization data for your application, the first time that the application tries to access personalization data, it will fail because an ASP.NET worker process running in <xref:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel> trust does not have the permissions necessary to call into the various classes in the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du konfigurerer programmet til å kjøre en klarering på <xref:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel>, og du bruker SqlPersonalizationProvider standardleverandøren administrere personlige data for programmet, første gang programmet prøver å få tilgang til personlige data, vil mislykkes fordi en ASP.NET-arbeidsprosess kjører i <xref:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel>klarering ikke har tillatelser som er nødvendig for å kalle til forskjellige klassene i den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient>navneområde.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient> </xref:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel> </xref:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.SqlPersonalizationProvider"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.SqlPersonalizationProvider"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The SqlPersonalizationProvider constructor is called by ASP.NET to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.SqlPersonalizationProvider> class as specified in the configuration for the application.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren SqlPersonalizationProvider kalles av ASP.NET til å opprette en forekomst av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.SqlPersonalizationProvider>klasse som er angitt i konfigurasjonen for applikasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.SqlPersonalizationProvider>

trans-unit.source: This constructor is not intended to be used from your code.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren skal ikke brukes fra koden.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the application to store and retrieve personalization information for.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på programmet til å lagre og hente personlige opplysninger for.

trans-unit.source: The ApplicationName property is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.SqlPersonalizationProvider> class to group user information.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ApplicationName brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.SqlPersonalizationProvider>klassen til gruppen brukerinformasjon.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.SqlPersonalizationProvider>

trans-unit.source: By qualifying user information with an application name, you can store information for multiple applications in a single database without running into conflicts between duplicate user names.
trans-unit.target: Ved å kvalifisere brukerinformasjon med navnet på programmet, kan du lagre informasjon for flere applikasjoner i én database uten å kjøre i konflikter mellom dupliserte brukernavn.

trans-unit.source: Also, multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same user database by specifying the same value in the ApplicationName property.
trans-unit.target: Flere ASP.NET-applikasjoner kan også bruke samme brukerdatabasen ved å angi samme verdi i egenskapen ApplicationName.

trans-unit.source: The ApplicationName property can be set programmatically, or it can be set declaratively in the configuration file for the Web application using the `applicationName` attribute in the `<providers>` section.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ApplicationName kan angis et program, eller den kan angis deklarativt i konfigurasjonsfilen for applikasjon-bruker den `applicationName` attributt i den `<providers>` delen.

trans-unit.source: If a value is not specified for the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file for the Web application, then the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.ApplicationVirtualPath%2A> property value for the first request made to the application is used.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en verdi ikke er angitt den `applicationName` attributt i konfigurasjonsfilen for webprogrammet, vil <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.ApplicationVirtualPath%2A>egenskapsverdien for den første forespørselen til programmet er brukt.</xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.ApplicationVirtualPath%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Because a single default personalization provider instance is used for all the requests served by an <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication> object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the ApplicationName property value.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Fordi en enkelt personlige data provider Standardforekomst brukes for alle forespørsler som behandles av en <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>objektet, du kan ha flere forespørsler kjøres samtidig, og forsøk på å angi egenskapsverdien ApplicationName.</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>

trans-unit.source: The ApplicationName property is not thread-safe for multiple writes, and changing the ApplicationName property value can result in unexpected behavior for multiple users of an application.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ApplicationName er ikke sikker for flere skriver, og endre egenskapsverdien ApplicationName kan føre til uventede resultater for flere brukere med en applikasjon.

trans-unit.source: It is recommended that you avoid code to allow users to set the ApplicationName property unless required.
trans-unit.target: Det anbefales at du unngår kode slik at brukerne kan angi egenskapen ApplicationName hvis nødvendig.

trans-unit.source: An example of an application where setting the ApplicationName property might be required is an administrative application that manages personalization data for multiple applications.
trans-unit.target: Et eksempel på et program der angivelse av ApplicationName-egenskapen kan være nødvendig er et administrative program som behandler personlige data for flere programmer.

trans-unit.source: Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application.
trans-unit.target: Et slikt program må være et program for én bruker og ikke et webprogram.

trans-unit.source: The name of the application to store and retrieve personalization information for.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på programmet til å lagre og hente personlige opplysninger for.

trans-unit.source: The default is the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.ApplicationVirtualPath*> property value for the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request*>.
trans-unit.target: Standard er det <> </> *> egenskapsverdien for gjeldende <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: The property was set to a string with a length greater than 256 characters.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen er satt til en streng med mer enn 256 tegn.

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection containing zero or more <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo"></xref>-derived objects, based on the specified scope and parameters.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en samling som inneholder null eller flere <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo"> </xref>-avledet objekter, basert på det angitte omfanget og parametere.

trans-unit.source: The set of returned items is constrained by the `pageSize` and `pageIndex` parameters, where `pageSize` controls the number of records to return and `pageIndex` controls which records to return.
trans-unit.target: Settet med returnerte elementer er begrenset av den `pageSize` og `pageIndex` parametere, der `pageSize` kontrollerer antall poster som skal returneres og `pageIndex` kontrollerer poster som skal returneres.

trans-unit.source: For example, a `pageIndex` of 0 and a `pageSize` of 25 would return the first 25 occurrences, while a `pageIndex` of 1 and a `pageSize` of 25 would return occurrences 26-50.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel en `pageIndex` 0 og en `pageSize` for 25 returnerer de første 25 forekomstene under en `pageIndex` 1 og en `pageSize` for 25 returnerer forekomster 26 50.

trans-unit.source: If you want to fetch all available records, set `pageIndex` to 0, and `pageSize` to <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil hente alle tilgjengelige poster, angi `pageIndex` til 0, og `pageSize` til <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue>.</xref:System.Int32.MaxValue>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo>-derived objects are returned in alphabetical order sorted by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo.Path%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.Username%2A>, both in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo>-avledede objektene alfabetisk sortert etter <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo.Path%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.Username%2A>, i stigende rekkefølge.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.Username%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo.Path%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo>

trans-unit.source: This method passes query wildcard characters to the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden sender spørringen jokertegn til den underliggende datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Support for wildcard characters is currently dependent on how each provider handles characters such as an asterisk (*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_).
trans-unit.target: Støtte for jokertegn er for øyeblikket er avhengig av hvordan hver leverandøren håndterer tegn som en stjerne (*), en prosent symbolet (%) eller et understrekingstegn (_).

trans-unit.source: Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, you can perform a wildcard search on a partial path with the wildcard character appearing at the beginning, the end, or the middle of the search string text in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis for SQL-kompatibel data butikker, kan du utføre en søk med jokertegn i en delvis banen med jokertegnet vises på begynnelsen, slutten eller midt i strengen søketeksten i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, to find all paths that start with "~/approot", the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A> property would be set to "~/approot%".
trans-unit.target: For eksempel for å finne alle baner som begynner med "~/approot" i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>vil være satt til "~/approot%".</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>

trans-unit.source: Likewise, a wildcard search on a partial user name could have the wildcard character appear at any point in the text string of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte et jokertegn Søk etter en delvis brukernavn kan ha jokertegnet vises når som helst i tekststreng med den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, to find all user names that start with "John", the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A> parameter would look like "John%".
trans-unit.target: For eksempel for å finne alle brukernavn som begynner med "Ola" den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A>parameteren vil se slik ut "Ola %".</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following query constraints apply: - If only `scope` is provided, and `query` is `null` or all the properties on `query` return either `null` or default values, then all records matching the indicated `scope` parameter are returned.
trans-unit.target: Følgende spørringsbegrensninger gjelder: – Hvis bare `scope` er angitt, og `query` er `null` eller alle egenskapene i `query` returneres enten `null` eller standardverdier, og alle poster som samsvarer med den angitte `scope` parameteren returneres.

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A> property is not `null`, the returned records are also filtered based on paths that match the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>egenskapen er ikke `null`, returnerte poster også er filtrert basert på baner som samsvarer med den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>egenskapsverdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A> property is not `null`, the returned records are also filtered based on user names that match the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A>egenskapen er ikke `null`, returnerte poster er også filtrert basert på brukernavn som samsvarer med den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A>egenskapsverdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A> property is not equal to <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>, then the returned records are also filtered to return only those records associated with inactive users.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A>egenskapen er ikke lik <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>, og deretter returnerte poster filtreres også for å returnere bare postene som er knyttet til inaktive brukere.</xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The comparison includes records where the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A> property is less than or equal to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Sammenligningen inneholder poster der den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A>egenskapen er mindre enn eller lik den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that this method does not validate combinations of query parameters.
trans-unit.target: Merk at denne metoden kan ikke valideres kombinasjoner av spørringsparametere.

trans-unit.source: For example, code can request a set of personalization state records associated with a specific user name in the shared scope.
trans-unit.target: Koden kan for eksempel be om et sett med tilpassing tilstand poster knyttet til et bestemt brukernavn i det delte omfanget.

trans-unit.source: Because user names are not associated with shared information, the returned collection would be empty.
trans-unit.target: Fordi brukernavn ikke er knyttet til delt informasjon, vil returnerte samlingen være tom.

trans-unit.source: Parameter combinations that have the potential to return a non-empty collection include: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> scope in combination with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Parameteren kombinasjoner som kan returnere en samling med ikke-tomme inkluderer:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>område i kombinasjon med <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> scope in combination with the values for any or all of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>omfang i kombinasjon med verdier for én eller flere av de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> indicating the personalization information to be queried.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> som angir den personlige informasjonen som skal spørres.

trans-unit.source: This value cannot be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien kan ikke være <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery"></xref> containing a query.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery"> </xref> som inneholder en spørring.

trans-unit.source: This value can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien kan være <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The location where the query starts.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen der spørringen starter.

trans-unit.source: The number of records to return.
trans-unit.target: Antall poster som skal returneres.

trans-unit.source: The total number of records available.
trans-unit.target: Totalt antall poster som er tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection"></xref> containing zero or more <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo"></xref>-derived objects.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfoCollection"> </xref> som inneholder null eller flere <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo"> </xref>-avledet objekter.

trans-unit.source: The scope specified is not a valid value from the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Den scope er ikke en gyldig verdi fra den opplisting.

trans-unit.source: Returns a count of the number of rows in the underlying data store that exist for the specified scope parameter.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en telling av antall rader i det underliggende datalageret som finnes på den angitte scope parameteren.

trans-unit.source: This method passes query wildcard characters to the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden sender spørringen jokertegn til den underliggende datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Support for wildcard characters is currently dependent on how each provider handles characters such as an asterisk (*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_).
trans-unit.target: Støtte for jokertegn er for øyeblikket er avhengig av hvordan hver leverandøren håndterer tegn som en stjerne (*), en prosent symbolet (%) eller et understrekingstegn (_).

trans-unit.source: Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, you can perform a wildcard search on a partial path with the wildcard character appearing at the beginning, the end, or the middle of the search string text in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis for SQL-kompatibel data butikker, kan du utføre en søk med jokertegn i en delvis banen med jokertegnet vises på begynnelsen, slutten eller midt i strengen søketeksten i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, to find all paths that start with "~/approot", the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A> property would be set to "~/approot%".
trans-unit.target: For eksempel for å finne alle baner som begynner med "~/approot" i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>vil være satt til "~/approot%".</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>

trans-unit.source: Likewise, a wildcard search on a partial user name could have the wildcard character appear at any point in the text string of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte et jokertegn Søk etter en delvis brukernavn kan ha jokertegnet vises når som helst i tekststreng med den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, to find all user names that start with "John", the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A> parameter would look like "John%".
trans-unit.target: For eksempel for å finne alle brukernavn som begynner med "Ola" den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A>parameteren vil se slik ut "Ola %".</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following query constraints apply: - If only `scope` is provided, and `query` is `null` or all the properties on `query` return either `null` or default values, then all records matching the indicated `scope` parameter are returned.
trans-unit.target: Følgende spørringsbegrensninger gjelder: – Hvis bare `scope` er angitt, og `query` er `null` eller alle egenskapene i `query` returneres enten `null` eller standardverdier, og alle poster som samsvarer med den angitte `scope` parameteren returneres.

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A> property is not `null`, the returned records are also filtered based on paths that match the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>egenskapen er ikke `null`, returnerte poster også er filtrert basert på baner som samsvarer med den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>egenskapsverdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A> is not `null`, the returned records are also filtered based on user names that match the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A>er ikke `null`, returnerte poster er også filtrert basert på brukernavn som samsvarer med den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A>egenskapsverdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A> property is not equal to <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>, then the returned records are also filtered to return only those records associated with inactive users.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A>egenskapen er ikke lik <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>, og deretter returnerte poster filtreres også for å returnere bare postene som er knyttet til inaktive brukere.</xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The comparison includes records where the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A> property is less than or equal to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Sammenligningen inneholder poster der den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A>egenskapen er mindre enn eller lik den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that this method does not validate combinations of query parameters.
trans-unit.target: Merk at denne metoden kan ikke valideres kombinasjoner av spørringsparametere.

trans-unit.source: For example, code can request a count of state records associated with inactive users in the shared scope.
trans-unit.target: Koden kan for eksempel be om et antall tilstand poster knyttet inaktive brukere i det delte omfanget.

trans-unit.source: Because there is no concept of inactive customizations, the returned count would be zero.
trans-unit.target: Fordi det finnes ingen begrep inaktiv tilpasninger, vil returnerte antallet være null.

trans-unit.source: Parameter combinations that have the potential to return a non-empty collection include: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> scope in combination with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Parameteren kombinasjoner som kan returnere en samling med ikke-tomme inkluderer:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>område i kombinasjon med <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> scope in combination with the values for any or all of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>omfang i kombinasjon med verdier for én eller flere av de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> indicating the personalization information to be queried.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> som angir den personlige informasjonen som skal spørres.

trans-unit.source: This value cannot be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien kan ikke være <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery"></xref> containing a query.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery"> </xref> som inneholder en spørring.

trans-unit.source: This value can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien kan være <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of rows in the underlying data store that exist for the specified scope parameter.
trans-unit.target: Antall rader i den underliggende datakilden som finnes på den angitte scope parameteren.

trans-unit.source: The scope specified is not a valid value from the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Den scope er ikke en gyldig verdi fra den opplisting.

trans-unit.source: Implements the initialization procedures required for a Microsoft SQL Server personalization provider.
trans-unit.target: Implementerer initialisering-prosedyrene som kreves for en leverandør for Microsoft SQL Server-personlige data.

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden skal ikke brukes direkte fra koden.

trans-unit.source: This method provides the initialization procedures for using personalization with a SQL database and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden inneholder fremgangsmåtene initialisering for bruk av personlige data til en SQL-database, og skal ikke brukes direkte fra koden.

trans-unit.source: The application name as it appears in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Programnavnet slik det vises i konfigurasjonsfilen.

trans-unit.source: The configuration settings for the application.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurasjonsinnstillingene for programmet.

trans-unit.source: configSettings is .
trans-unit.target: configSettingsis .

trans-unit.source: Loads personalization data from the underlying data store, based on the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn personlige data fra underliggende datakilden, basert på de angitte parameterne.

trans-unit.source: This method uses the `webPartManager`, `path`, and `username` parameters as retrieval keys.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden bruker den `webPartManager`, `path`, og `username` parametere som henting av nøkler.

trans-unit.source: The returned data contains: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> data returned in the `sharedDataBlob` parameter.
trans-unit.target: De returnerte dataene inneholder: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>dataene som ble returnert i den `sharedDataBlob` parameteren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>

trans-unit.source: - Depending on the key values, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> data is returned in the `userDataBlob` parameter.
trans-unit.target: -Avhengig nøkkelverdiene, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>data returneres i den `userDataBlob` parameteren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>

trans-unit.source: A non-`null` value for the `userName` parameter indicates that <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> data is also retrieved.
trans-unit.target: En ikke -`null` verdi den `userName` parameteren angir som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>hentes også data.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.SqlPersonalizationProvider> object automatically updates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A> column in the `aspnet_Users` table each time user-specific personalization data is loaded from the database in the context of a page request.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.SqlPersonalizationProvider>objektet oppdateres automatisk i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A>kolonne i den `aspnet_Users` tabellen hver gang brukerspesifikke personlige data er lastet inn fra databasen i konteksten for en sideforespørsel.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.SqlPersonalizationProvider>

trans-unit.source: This behavior allows other ASP.NET features to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A> property when managing stale data records as well as determining recent user activity on a site.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør det mulig for andre funksjoner for ASP.NET å bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A>egenskapen når du administrerer tilstandsdata poster samt avgjørende nylige brukeraktivitet på et område.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> managing the personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> behandling av personlige data.

trans-unit.source: The path for personalization information in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope to be used as the retrieval key.
trans-unit.target: Banen til den personlige informasjonen i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> området som skal brukes som henting-nøkkelen.

trans-unit.source: The user name for personalization information in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope to be used as the retrieval key.
trans-unit.target: Brukernavn for informasjon om tilpassing i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> området som skal brukes som henting-nøkkelen.

trans-unit.source: The returned data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope.
trans-unit.target: De returnerte dataene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> omfanget.

trans-unit.source: The returned data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope.
trans-unit.target: De returnerte dataene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> omfanget.

trans-unit.source: Deletes personalization data from the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: Sletter personlige data fra den underliggende datakilden.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> uses this method to delete personalization data from the database when a Web site user chooses to reset Web Parts data on a page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>bruker denne metoden til å slette personlige data fra databasen når webområdet brukeren velger å tilbakestille webdeler data på en side.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>

trans-unit.source: If `username` is non-`null`, data with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> scope data is deleted; otherwise, data with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> scope is deleted.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `username` er ikke -`null`, data med den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>omfanget dataene er slettet; ellers, data med den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>omfang er slettet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.SqlPersonalizationProvider> object automatically updates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A> column in the `aspnet_Users` table each time user-specific personalization data is deleted from the database in the context of a page request.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.SqlPersonalizationProvider>objektet oppdateres automatisk i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A>kolonne i den `aspnet_Users` tabellen hver gang brukerspesifikke personlige data slettes fra databasen i konteksten for en sideforespørsel.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.SqlPersonalizationProvider>

trans-unit.source: This behavior allows other ASP.NET features to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A> value when managing stale data records as well as determining recent user activity on a site.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør det mulig for andre funksjoner for ASP.NET å bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A>verdi når behandle tilstandsdata poster samt avgjørende nylige brukeraktivitet på et område.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> managing the personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> behandling av personlige data.

trans-unit.source: The path for personalization information in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope to be used as the retrieval key.
trans-unit.target: Banen til den personlige informasjonen i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> området som skal brukes som henting-nøkkelen.

trans-unit.source: The user name for personalization information in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope to be used as the retrieval key.
trans-unit.target: Brukernavn for informasjon om tilpassing i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> området som skal brukes som henting-nøkkelen.

trans-unit.source: Deletes personalization state information from the underlying data store, based on the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: Sletter informasjon om bruk av personlige data fra den underliggende datakilden, basert på de angitte parameterne.

trans-unit.source: No wildcard characters are supported by this method.
trans-unit.target: Ingen jokertegn støttes av denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: Only the following combinations of parameters are allowed: - The `scope` parameter is set, and all other parameters are set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Bare følgende kombinasjoner av parameterne er tillatt: - `scope` parameter er angitt, og alle andre parametere som er satt til `null`.

trans-unit.source: This combination deletes all Web Parts personalization data associated with the personalization scope indicated by `scope`.
trans-unit.target: Denne kombinasjonen sletter alle webdeler personlige data som er forbundet med område som er angitt av `scope`.

trans-unit.source: - The `scope` parameter is set, and the `paths` parameter contains at least one value.
trans-unit.target: - `scope` Parameter er angitt, og `paths` parameteren inneholder minst én verdi.

trans-unit.source: This combination deletes all Web Parts personalization data for the specified path or paths that are in the personalization scope indicated by `scope`.
trans-unit.target: Denne kombinasjonen sletter alle webdeler personlige data for angitt bane eller baner som er i omfanget for personlige data som er angitt av `scope`.

trans-unit.source: - The `scope` parameter is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>, the `paths` parameter is set and contains only one path, and the `usernames` parameter contains at least one value.
trans-unit.target: - `scope` Parameteren er satt til <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>, `paths` parameter er angitt, og inneholder bare én bane og `usernames` parameteren inneholder minst én verdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>

trans-unit.source: This combination deletes all user personalization Web Parts data for the given path that is associated with the user or users contained in `usernames`.
trans-unit.target: Denne kombinasjonen sletter alle bruker personlige data webdeler for angitt bane som er knyttet til brukeren eller brukerne i `usernames`.

trans-unit.source: - The `scope` parameter is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>, the `paths` parameter is `null`, and the `usernames` parameter contains at least one value.
trans-unit.target: - `scope` Parameteren er satt til <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>, `paths` parameteren er `null`, og `usernames` parameteren inneholder minst én verdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>

trans-unit.source: This combination deletes all per-user personalization Web Parts data, across all paths, associated with the user or users contained in `usernames`.
trans-unit.target: Denne kombinasjonen, slettes alle brukerspesifikke tilpassing webdeler data på tvers av alle baner som er knyttet til brukeren eller brukerne i `usernames`.

trans-unit.source: Any other combination of parameter values is invalid and will throw an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception.
trans-unit.target: En kombinasjon av verdier for rapportparametere er ugyldig, og vil iverksette en <xref:System.ArgumentException>unntak.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: For example, the following two combinations are not allowed: - The `usernames` parameter cannot be provided when the `scope` parameter is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel følgende to kombinasjoner er ikke tillatt: - `usernames` parameteren kan ikke angis når den `scope` parameteren er satt til <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>

trans-unit.source: - The `paths` parameter cannot contain more than one entry when the `usernames` parameter is not `null`.
trans-unit.target: - `paths` Parameteren kan ikke inneholde mer enn én post når den `usernames` -parameteren er ikke `null`.

trans-unit.source: The `paths` and `usernames` parameters contained within the respective arrays must meet the following validation rules.
trans-unit.target: Den `paths` og `usernames` parametere i de respektive matrisene må oppfylle følgende valideringsregler.

trans-unit.source: If any validation rules fail for any member of the parameter arrays, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis alle valideringsregler som mislykkes for et medlem av parameter-matriser en <xref:System.ArgumentException>unntak.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: The validation rules include: - `null` values are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: Valideringsregler inkluderer:- `null` verdier er ikke tillatt.

trans-unit.source: - An empty string ("") after the string has been trimmed is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: – En tom streng ("") når strengen er beskåret er ikke tillatt.

trans-unit.source: - No user names contained in the `usernames` parameter can contain commas.
trans-unit.target: – Ingen brukernavn i den `usernames` parameteren kan inneholde komma.

trans-unit.source: - The length of any path in the `paths` parameter cannot be greater than 256 characters.
trans-unit.target: -Lang baner i den `paths` parameteren kan ikke være større enn 256 tegn.

trans-unit.source: - The length of any user name in the `usernames` parameter cannot be greater than 256 characters.
trans-unit.target: -Lengden på brukernavnene i den `usernames` parameteren kan ikke være større enn 256 tegn.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> indicating the personalization information to be queried.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> som angir den personlige informasjonen som skal spørres.

trans-unit.source: This value cannot be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien kan ikke være <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The paths for personalization information in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: Baner for den personlige informasjonen i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> området som skal slettes.

trans-unit.source: The user names for personalization information in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: Brukernavn for informasjon om tilpassing i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> området som skal slettes.

trans-unit.source: The number of rows deleted.
trans-unit.target: Antall rader som ble slettet.

trans-unit.source: The scope specified is not a member of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Den scope er ikke medlem av den opplisting.

trans-unit.source: Deletes user personalization data from the underlying data store, based on the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: Sletter bruker personlige data fra den underliggende datakilden, basert på de angitte parameterne.

trans-unit.source: This method's parameters have the following restrictions: - The `path` parameter cannot contain wildcard characters.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden parametere har følgende begrensninger: - `path` parameteren kan ikke inneholde jokertegn.

trans-unit.source: - If the `path` parameter is non-`null`, then only per-user personalization records associated with `path` will be deleted.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis den `path` parameteren er ikke -`null`, og deretter bare brukerspesifikke tilpassing poster knyttet `path` slettes.

trans-unit.source: - Only per-user personalization records associated with users that are considered inactive since the date specified in the `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter will be deleted.
trans-unit.target: – Bare brukerspesifikke personlige data-poster knyttet til brukere som regnes inaktiv siden datoen som er angitt i den `userInactiveSinceDate` parameteren slettes.

trans-unit.source: The exact comparison would be to delete records where the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A> property is less than or equal to the `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Nøyaktige sammenligningen er å slette poster der den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A>egenskapen er mindre enn eller lik den `userInactiveSinceDate` parameteren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If both parameters are provided, then records that match both constraints are deleted.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis begge parameterne er angitt, slettes poster som samsvarer med både begrensninger.

trans-unit.source: - The `path` parameter can be `null`.
trans-unit.target: - `path` Parameteren kan være `null`.

trans-unit.source: - The `path` parameter cannot be an empty string after trimming.
trans-unit.target: - `path` Parameteren kan ikke være en tom streng etter kutting.

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A> property cannot be `null`.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A>Egenskapen kan ikke være `null`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The path of the personalization data to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: Banen til den personlige data som skal slettes.

trans-unit.source: This value can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> but cannot be an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien kan være <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> , men kan ikke være en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: The date indicating the last activity.
trans-unit.target: Datoen siste aktivitet.

trans-unit.source: The count of rows deleted from the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: Antall rader som ble slettet fra underliggende datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Saves raw personalization data to the underlying Microsoft SQL Server database.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer raw personlige data til den underliggende Microsoft SQL Server-databasen.

trans-unit.source: If a non-`null` user name is provided, then the `dataBlob` parameter contains personalization data for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> scope; otherwise, `dataBlob` is assumed to contain data for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> scope.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en ikke -`null` brukernavnet er angitt, vil `dataBlob` parameteren inneholder personlige data for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>område; ellers `dataBlob` antas inneholder data for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>omfang.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.SqlPersonalizationProvider> object automatically updates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A> column in the `aspnet_Users` table each time user-specific personalization data is saved to the database in the context of a page request.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.SqlPersonalizationProvider>objektet oppdateres automatisk i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A>kolonne i den `aspnet_Users` tabellen hver gang brukerspesifikke personlige data lagres i databasen i konteksten for en sideforespørsel.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.SqlPersonalizationProvider>

trans-unit.source: This behavior allows other ASP.NET features to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A> property when managing stale data records as well as determining recent user activity on a site.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør det mulig for andre funksjoner for ASP.NET å bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A>egenskapen når du administrerer tilstandsdata poster samt avgjørende nylige brukeraktivitet på et område.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> managing the personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> behandling av personlige data.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> indicating the personalization information to be saved.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> som viser informasjon om tilpassing lagres.

trans-unit.source: This value cannot be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien kan ikke være <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The user name for personalization information in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"></xref> scope to be used as the key.
trans-unit.target: Brukernavn for informasjon om tilpassing i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope"> </xref> området som skal brukes som nøkkel.

trans-unit.source: The byte array of data to be saved.
trans-unit.target: Bytematrise av dataene lagres.
